Action.author: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Action.body: When using some crypto suites, (like with an HSM) the private key will not be available ... why do you need to export ?

Action.author: davidkel
Action.body: Composer still uses this approach for non-hsm users, we should be using public methods not internal properties to do this.

Action.author: davidkel
Action.body: Closing as this won't ever get done and composer has already accesses the internal property.
